content: d k - knit dk set-up k14 17 19 22 24 pm knit to end k2tog - knit 2 sts together worsted set-up k12 14 16 18 20 pm knit to end m1 - make one stitch by preferred method chunky set-up k11 13 14 16 18 pm knit to end p - purl pm - place marker note you will now have 2 markers the bor sm - slip marker marker and the second marker placed in the set- ssk - slip 2 sts knitwise one at a time knit 2 up round slipped sts together through back loops st s - stitch es the world s simplest mittens facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 3 tin can knits in vancouver + edinburgh www tincanknits com
